# UriExtensions.IsAccessible method

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the specified Uri is accessible synchronously.

```csharp
public static IResult IsAccessible(this Uri uri)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| uri | Target Uri to check |

## Return Value

true if specified Uri is accessible; otherwise false.
